mapper.sql:
SELECT sstd_sstr_pk, sstd_tpdt_pk , sstd_o_nentero, sstd_o_ndecimal, sstd_o_cadena, sstd_o_fecha, sstd_o_prmt_pk, sstd_o_srvc_pk , sstd_d_nentero, sstd_d_ndecimal, sstd_d_cadena, sstd_d_fecha, sstd_d_prmt_pk, sstd_d_srvc_pk
, (SELECT prmt_parametro FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_pk = sstd_o_prmt_pk) AS o_prmt_parametro , (SELECT prmt_parametro FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_pk = sstd_d_prmt_pk) AS d_prmt_parametro
, (SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'prvr' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} AND i18n_ext_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = sstd_o_prmt_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) ) ) AS o_prmt_texto , (SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'prvr' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} AND i18n_ext_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = sstd_d_prmt_pk AND #{fechaVigencia} BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, #{fechaVigencia}) ) ) AS d_prmt_texto
FROM tbl_subservicio_trmt_dato_sstd
